prompt: Create a profile page with a compact layout, featuring a small circular profile picture (100px diameter) at the top left. The user's name should be in bold black text (font size 24), and the email in gray (font size 14), both aligned to the left below the picture. Place three action buttons (Edit Profile, Settings, Logout) in a vertical stack on the right side, each with a blue background, white text, and rounded corners (radius 15). Use a white background with minimal padding (16px). The layout should be top-aligned with a clean, space-efficient design.
